name: Thierry Suthiyong Mekwattana
description: '''Suthiyong Mekwattana''' or commonly known as '''Thierry Mekwattana''' ({{langx|th|สุทธิยงค์ เมฆวัฒนา, เทียรี่ เมฆวัฒนา}}; born: April 23, 1958) is a Thai singer and musician of Swiss and Chinese descent, he is best known as a member of [[Carabao (band)|Carabao]], a famous and popular [[Thai rock]] and ''[[Phleng phuea chiwit]]'' (Thai [[protest song]]) band.
